text: Streets of Rage is a beat 'em up video game. It was released in Japan as . The game was made and published by Sega for the Sega Genesis in 1991, for the Game Gear in 1992 and for the Master System in 1993. It is the first game in the Streets of Rage series. It is followed by Streets of Rage 2 (released in 1992). == References == Category:1991 video games Category:Streets of Rage Category:Arcade games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Game Gear games Category:IOS games Category:Master System games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Organized crime video games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Sega beat 'em ups Category:Sega CD games Category:Sega Genesis games Category:Side-scrolling beat 'em ups Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual Console games Category:Xbox 360 Live Arcade games
title: Streets of Rage (video game)
